courses.title: Full Stack Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Learn to build web applications from scratch using MERN stack.

instructor.name: Alice Johnson

lessons.title: Introduction to MERN Stack
lessons.content: Overview of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js.

assignments.title: Create a Simple MERN App
assignments.description: Build a basic MERN application with user authentication.

ratings.comment: Great content, but could use more examples.

instructor.name: Bob Williams

lessons.title: Understanding Closures and Scopes
lessons.content: Explore closures, scopes, and the execution context in JavaScript.

assignments.title: Closure Challenges
assignments.description: Complete a series of challenges to demonstrate your understanding of closures.

ratings.comment: The content is excellent, but the pacing is a bit fast.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and mix in the grated Parmesan cheese.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
Combine the hot spaghetti with pancetta, then quickly mix in the egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper on top.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Cook onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan until soft.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato puree and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat sesame oil and add garlic and ginger.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and mix well.
Serve hot over rice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Add the egg and vanilla extract, mixing well.
Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheets and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer sliced tomatoes and mozzarella cheese on a plate.
Tuck in fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
